body_text:
Century Global Commodities Corporation 			 
 
		 
 
 You are here:  Home   /  Investors Investors 
 
 Century Global Commodities Corporation, (formerly Century Iron Mines Corporation pre November 18, 2015) is a Cayman Islands incorporated exploration and development company that trades on the Toronto Stock Exchange (“TSX”) under the symbol “CNT”. 
 
 Our Strategy 
 Century’s strategic approach is to develop our most advanced iron ore project, Joyce Lake DSO Iron Project, in the current cycle with the goal of developing our multi-billion tonne iron ore resources over the long term.  Recognizing the cyclicality of the global commodities market, the Company has also seized counter-cyclical business opportunities to sustain the Company as we have done over the last down cycle, and preserve value of our iron ore assets from dilution in difficult times.  While having a portfolio of massive resources of iron ore, which moves in cycles different from other metals, Century has taken advantage of identifying and investing in non-ferrous opportunities within its core competence to best deploy its internal resources to create value before the right conditions for iron ore arise, as it has done so generating cash and profit to distribute dividends to shareholders in the last cycle. 
 Century’s Strategic Advantages 
 
 Strong balance sheet with liquid working capital 
 100% owned major iron ore deposits in Canada 
 Rapidly advancing Joyce Lake towards production decision 
 28.2% equity ownership by Chinese State-Owned Enterprises  Baowu and Minmetals 
 Capital market and M&A expertise with a proven track record of raising funds 
 Contact networks within China
